title: Andrea Leadsom – 2020 Speech at Airbus New Year’s Reception
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Andrea Leadsom, the Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy, at the Cinnamon Club in London on 8 January 2020.
content:
